item.title: Director - China
item.description: Director and founder, since 2019, based in Beijing.

item.title: Partners
item.description: Rainbow Health International has, as a world class service provider in Healthcare, provided its services to international organisations such as UNICEF, UNOPS, WHO and ICRC. Together with major institutions, it has solved the requirements needs for multiple medical supplies partners across Asia and Europe to date. Providing World class solutions tailored to each client

item.title: Business Sales
item.description: We specialize in business to business sales, connecting you directly with PPE producers world wide. Contact us for more detailed information, products and pricing, for all your PPE requirements. Full service from producer to business Taking care of all your requirements Meeting your demands Preperation is key to unlocking your goals Let us help you prepare, deliver and service your requirements.

item.title: Business Advisory
item.description: New clients receive free consultation, contact us now for your tailor made solution

item.title: About
item.description: Rainbow Health International PTE.LTD is a distribution agent and service provider in the field of healthcare. With offices in Beijing and outlets in Continental Europe and UK/Ireland, we have an extensive knowledge of cross-continent healthcare needs, and have been providing Personal Protective Equipment to markets and institutions across the World. Connecting Medical Supplies companies directly to producers, guaranteeing product scrutiny, lead time analysis, and handling delivery agencies where required, Rainbow Health International can provide a producer to market service on a daily basis.
